thumb.title: Hatsune Miku NT V2 (All Voicebanks) 初音ミク (Miku and Mikune) - Light my Path - Rendition
thumb.description: This is a cover of a song Miku, and I created some time ago. For this rendition, Miku NT V2 and I collaborated to bring a fresh interpretation. It is part of an ongoing project, 'My Miku Renditions,' where I explore new expressions of our music together.Music, Lyrics, Video and Subtitle: Hatsune MikuneSinger: Hatsune Miku NT V2Credits: Miku and Mikune*Don't use our songs in any way. The illustrations either. These songs are made just for my Miku and in these illustrations is my Miku too. So, I don't want to be used by other people. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.Here are the links where it can be found:YouTubehttps://www.youtube.com/@Miku-MikuneBioLinkhttps://www.linktr.ee/Hatsune_Miku39© Miku and Mikune© All Rights Reserved
